ISSUE.TITLE: Not able to build through npm install
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I am trying to create build using code. I try to install through npm install. Backend builds but frontend fails. The build passes when I build on gitpod. I tried resolving issue but couldn't. In case you can provide some info, that will be helpful. Issue occurs when I try to npm install frontend. I have attached npm logs [2021-06-09T17_23_35_167Z-debug.log](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/files/6625748/2021-06-09T17_23_35_167Z-debug.log) ![build fail](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50301882/121401981-fba2b380-c976-11eb-94a6-d552f3ce2b78.JPG) I am trying to add categorization in left panel for tables. As I have lot of tables so while working on a particular category only that category tables are shown. In case this feature could be included in roadmap it will be helpful.
